articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Taiwan scrambles fighters to see off Chinese warplanes as Xi meets top brass
articles.description: Taiwan's air force scrambled again on Sunday to warn away 27 Chinese aircraft that entered its air defense zone, Taiwan's Defense Ministry said, the latest increase in tensions across the Taiwan Strait as China's President met his top generals.

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc and Sarah Fortinsky, CNN
articles.title: Carrie Meek, trailblazing Black former congresswoman, dies at 95
articles.description: Former Rep. Carrie Meek, who broke barriers throughout her winding political career as the daughter of a sharecropper and granddaughter of a slave, died Sunday in her Miami home. She was 95.

articles.title: GOP Rep. Nancy Mace calls out Rep. Lauren Boebert's 'racist tropes' - CNN Video
articles.description: Rep. Nancy Mace (R-SC) reacts to inflammatory and anti-muslim comments made by her colleague Rep. Lauren Boebert (R-CO).

articles.author: Jacob Lev, CNN
articles.title: Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid on bout with Covid-19: 'I really thought I wasn't going to make it'
articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid returned to the court on Saturday night after being forced to miss nine games due to a positive Covid-19 result

articles.title: Acosta: Rep. Ronny Jackson is 'doctor of disinformation' for the far right - CNN Video
articles.description: Dr. Jonathan Reiner and Jim Acosta discuss a tweet from Rep. Ronny Jackson (R-TX) in which he claims the omicron variant was made up to help Democrats in the 2022 midterm elections.

articles.author: Martin Goillandeau and Ivana Kottasová, CNN
articles.title: Omicron variant puts world in a 'race against time', says EU Commission President
articles.description: The world is in a "race against time" with the Omicron coronavirus variant, said European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Sunday, warning during a visit to Riga that scientists and manufacturers will need weeks to fully understand the new variant.

articles.author: Holly Yan and Aya Elamroussi, CNN
articles.title: The new Omicron variant is a reminder that 'the virus is still in control' regardless of Covid-19 fatigue, medical professor says
articles.description: The new Omicron variant might prompt a return to stricter Covid-19 measures if not enough people get vaccinated or boosted, health experts say.
articles.content:

articles.title: Live updates: New Covid-19 variant Omicron cases, travel updates from around the world
articles.description: The US, European Union and other major destinations have moved to block flights from African countries following the discovery of an aggressive mutation of the Covid-19 virus. Follow for the latest news updates.

articles.title: Vaccine inequity and hesitancy made the Omicron variant more likely, scientists say

articles.author: By Tamara Hardingham-Gill, Laura Smith-Spark and Ivana Kottasová, CNN
articles.title: Travel doors slam shut as new Covid variant triggers alarm, stranding hundreds of passengers
articles.description: The European Union and other major destinations have moved to block flights from African countries following the discovery of the variant, echoing previous emergency responses that triggered a global freeze on travel.
